titleStmt.title: A wise and moderate discourse, concerning church-affaires. As it was written, long since, by the famous authour of those considerations, which seem to have some reference to this. Now published for the common good.
titleStmt.author: Bacon, Francis, 1561-1626.

titleStmt.title: A wise and moderate discourse, concerning church-affaires. As it was written, long since, by the famous authour of those considerations, which seem to have some reference to this. Now published for the common good.
titleStmt.author: Bacon, Francis, 1561-1626.

notesStmt.note: Variant: quire B wrongly imposed, the text for p. 2-3 interchanged with p. 6-7.
Annotation on Thomason copy: "by Sr ffra: Bacon. Ld. Chancellor".
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
